andromeda.why: Refuses coerced deals; honors sovereignty over ‘closing at any cost.’

arcturus.why: Sets an honest container for promises—scope, limits, and deliverables before pitch.

draco.why: Status-posturing and pressure tactics to force agreement.

lyra.why: Glimmers of persuasive style, but foundation > show.

orion-dark.why: Manipulative framing to secure obedience or control.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of integrity: underpromise, keep word, earn trust.

pleiades.why: Attunes to the other’s needs so the bargain truly nourishes.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching stewardship—personal will hygiene, not formal transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Won’t be strong-armed into overcommitment; defends free consent.

arcturus.why: Calibrates claims to capacity; builds a reliable exchange container.

lyra.why: Persuasive story gains clarity and tasteful rhythm.

orion-dark.why: Procedure as cover for subtle coercion.

orion-light.why: Honor-bound bargaining: say the true price and terms.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement makes the agreement humane and sustainable.

sirius.why: Practical stewardship of will/resources; not yet a teaching channel.

draco.why: Rank games and access gatekeeping around resources.

orion-light.why: Integrity ordeal: admit error, correct the deal, re-earn trust.

sirius.why: Self-forging through trial-and-error; no law transmission yet.

arcturus.why: Turns persuasion into protocol—clear offers, verifiable delivery, review cycles.

lyra.why: Clean, charismatic narrative that helps the right deal land.

orion-dark.why: Orthodoxy of ‘best practices’ used to strong-arm outcomes.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-example: others face the ordeal of honest bargaining.

pleiades.why: Ensures the exchange actually nourishes all parties.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda capture; defends truthful terms under projection.

arcturus.why: Cast as the fixer/closer for everyone → burnout/scapegoat when nuance resists.

draco.why: Authority aura breeds loyalty tests and access policing.

lyra.why: Iconic pitch presence—style that still points to substance.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine capture: enforcing ‘the way to sell’ to preserve control.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—keep the bargain clean despite pressure.

pleiades.why: Appeasement offers that later harm capacity and trust.
